thread.title: Ariana Grande Goes Blonde in Cover Art of New Single 'Focus'
thread.title_full: Ariana Grande Goes Blonde in Cover Art of New Single 'Focus'

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Ariana Grande Goes Blonde in Cover Art of New Single 'Focus'
text:
Comments The singer shows off her platinum blonde hair in her signature half-up, half-down style in the black-and-white artwork shot by her pal Alfredo Flores. 
Ariana Grande ditches her brown hair in the official cover art of her highly-anticipated new single, "Focus". The former Nickelodeon star rocks platinum blonde as she poses for the artwork she unveiled via Instagram on Wednesday, October 14. In the image, shot in black and white, Grande shows off her brand new hair in her signature half-up, half-down style, crosses her arms around her chest and stares into the distance while her name and the title of her upcoming song are projected onto her body and wall behind her. In the caption, she said the snap was taken by her pal Alfredo Flores. The pint-sized diva also reminded her fans that she's only 16 days away from dropping "Focus", which is set to lead her new album " Moonlight ". A photo posted by Ariana Grande (@arianagrande) on Oct 13, 2015 at 9:56pm PDT Still having no release date, the LP marks Grande's third. It follows up 2013's " Yours Truly " and 2014's " My Everything " that both debuted at No. 1 on Billboard 200.
